detail.content: Cruising the city street on Harley-Davidson's 2018 Softail Fat Bob is a great way to turn heads while having a blast on two wheels.
Weighing in at 673 pounds in running order, the 2018 Harley-Davidson Softail Fat Bob allows for ample cruising with a 3.6 gallon fuel capacity.
The 2018 Harley-Davidson Softail Fat Bob boasts a 107 ci engine to get you ripping down the road with ease.
Cruising the city street on Harley-Davidson's 2018 Softail Low Rider is a great way to turn heads while having a blast on two wheels.
Weighing in at 661 pounds in running order, the 2018 Harley-Davidson Softail Low Rider allows for ample cruising with a 5.0 gallon fuel capacity.
The 2018 Harley-Davidson Softail Low Rider boasts a 107 ci engine to get you ripping down the road with ease.
Cruising the city street on Harley-Davidson's 2018 Softail Fat Bob 114 is a great way to turn heads while having a blast on two wheels.

The 2018 Harley-Davidson Softail Street Bob boasts a 107 ci engine to get you ripping down the road with ease.
